content: learn how to create this cute whale amigurumi with this free whale crochet pattern this pattern has a full video tutorial included perfect for beginners it is also very quick to make takes about 1 to 2 hours you can use any yarn to make it i made a small keychain sea animal from sport weight cotton yarn and big whale from chenille super bulky plush yarn link to written pattern https //www mariskavos nl/free-whale-crochet-pattern/ link to youtube video tutorial https //youtu be/oikipb5mjou
